experience.title: Senior Graphic Designer
experience.description: As a senior graphic designer, I am instrumental in Digital Marketing, Branding,UI/UX Designing, Motion Graphics, Illustration, Character Animation, and Video Editing.

experience.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
experience.description: As a freelancer, I design illustrations, create motion graphics, and do video editing. Coming from a background in traditional art, I do commission work that involves painting, drawing, and printing.
